cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 275 mi SSW of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northeastward, passing southeast of New England tonight and moving toward a landfall in Nova Scotia late Saturday

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Mid-Atlantic coast from North Carolina through Maine and Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds (39â€“57 mph) affected the port area Friday afternoon; winds are rapidly subsiding tonight.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor water-level rise possible in tidal estuaries, but no significant surge impacts expected as warnings have been discontinued.
weather_observation.rainfall: Bands of rain already moved through; additional significant rainfall is not expected.
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents lingering along Virginia beaches through Saturday.
